column5: Pulled myself away from the rivers to try targeting these monster cats that some fellow BPS staff got into last week. Hit Fishmasters marina and he was more than helpful in telling me were to fish and sharing some info, Thanks for that. Our group did alright with some monster carp, good drum and a gauntlet of cats from 1/4 lb to my 17lb cat. Never targeted them before but will make a point to try it again next year. Many dew worms threaded on the hook was the ticket, hope ya got a backyard full of them cause it can get expensive LOL...   Tight lines RF
Cats and dogs don't get along.
Beauty fish buddy.  Wish I layed into one of those when I was there.  Great job!
Well done Ryan! Sounds like it might be a good idea to take a map next time.  Would cut about an hour off your drive
